tha-ap64:1.4_0: as he teaches the deathless state.
tha-ap64:3.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
tha-ap64:3.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
tha-ap64:3.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
tha-ap64:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap64:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap64:5.1_0: When twenty-four items have been brought,
tha-ap64:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap64:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgārava.
tha-ap64:8.1_0: They didn’t see the most senior mendicant inheritance.
